title: Equity Participation Fund (Repeal) Act, 2016
description: Official consolidated text of Equity Participation Fund (Repeal) Act, 2016 (XXI of 2016) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Equity
Participation Fund (Repeal) Act, 2016.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Repeal
provisions.content:
(1) The Equity Participation Fund Ordinance, 1970 (1 of 1970) is hereby
repealed.
